title: Plus Therapeutics Approves Key Proposals at Annual Meeting
snippet: An announcement from Plus Therapeutics ( ($PSTV) ) is now available. On August 7, 2025, Plus Therapeutics held its Annual Meeting of Stockholders

title: Plus Therapeutics Reports Second Quarter Financial Results and Recent Business Highlights
snippet: Net income for second quarter of 2025 was $5.2 million, or $0.02 per share, compared to a net loss of $2.9 million, or $ (0.45) per share, for the same quarter the prior year; the substantial change is due to $6.5 million of pre-tax income from change in the fair value of derivative instruments

title: Plus Therapeutics files to sell 33M shares of common stock for holders
snippet: Plus Therapeutics (NASDAQ:PSTV) filed a prospectus for the offer and sale of 33M shares of common stock by the selling stockholder.  This prospectus is not an offer to sell these securities.  Filing.

title: Plus (PSTV) Upgraded to Buy: Here's What You Should Know
snippet: Plus (PSTV) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.
